title: Tankard
description: Tankard with central panel reserved on sprayed purple ground, crude conventionalized floral border at top and bottom, panel carries design of bird on branch, floral and decorative details in blue, green, yellow, brown, and ovcerglaze red orange, pewter base and shallow domed lid with ball thumbpiece on stem, coin inset on upper face of lid with symbolic marriage scene and motto Cat Card Dims H.10in
